name: Where's Work
description: Looking for a streamlined and simple to use job search website. Then look no further then 'Where's Work'
technologies: Uses JavaScript, jQuery, Muse API, and MapQuest API.

name: Band-Aids

name: Workday Scheduler
description: This Daily Work Day Planner will display different colors based on the time of day to keep you on track.

name: Budget Tracker
description: This Progressive Web App (PWA) is a budget tracker that will allow users to be able to add expenses and deposits to their transactions.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, Service-Worker, IndexDB, and Webpack
